view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as the view that display the UI.
    Author:
    Nicolae Turcan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      View()
      Display the window that let's you select a folder containing the images.
